description: Provides a description of the retraining scheduler, including information such as the model name and retraining parameters.

parameters.name: ModelName
parameters.description: The name of the model that the retraining scheduler is attached to.

nested_items.name: ModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the model that the retraining scheduler is attached to.

nested_items.name: ModelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the model that the retraining scheduler is attached to.

nested_items.name: RetrainingStartDate
nested_items.description: The start date for the retraining scheduler. Lookout for Equipment truncates the time you provide to the nearest UTC day.

nested_items.name: RetrainingFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency at which the model retraining is set. This follows the ISO 8601 guidelines.

nested_items.name: LookbackWindow
nested_items.description: The number of past days of data used for retraining.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the retraining scheduler.

nested_items.name: PromoteMode
nested_items.description: Indicates how the service uses new models. In MANAGED mode, new models are used for inference if they have better performance than the current model. In MANUAL mode, the new models are not used until they are manually activated.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: Indicates the time and date at which the retraining scheduler was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: Indicates the time and date at which the retraining scheduler was updated.
